6 H6 'dul ba, tha 1b1-da 509a7 (vol. 10-11) 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi bi na ya k+Sha dra ka bastu 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / d+harma shrI pra b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur/ zhus dag legs par byas so/ /phran tshegs 'di la dpe mang yang / /yid bstan thub pa cig kyang med/ /'gyur yang cung zad mi bde zhing / /tshig brul brda rnying mngas pa dang/ /glegs bam tha mar nye ba yis/ zhu dag mkhan po rnams kyis kyang / /sems dub skyo ba'i dbang gis ni/ /phal cher btang snyoms bzhag par mngon/ /klag mi bde zhing brir mi bde/ /cung zad bcos su 'ang mi bde zhing/ /thams cad the tshom gzhir gyur pas/ /kho bo'i sems kyang cung zad dub/ /'on kyang brnag par ma dor bar/ /spro dang 'dun pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dam pa'i thugs dgongs mthar phyin cing / /bstan pa'i rgyun la 'ang phan bsams nas/ /dus ni cung zad 'gor na yang / /long med rings tshul ma byas par/ /'ol tshod rang bzo spangs nas ni/ /legs brtags legs par rab dpyad nas/ /shin tu nges pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /the tsom za rnams zer mtshan bkod/ /gdon mi za rnams legs par bcos/ /tshul 'di mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan du/ /phyi mtha' bar du 'gyur bar shog /'di ni phyi mo la gtugs pa dang snar thang gi dpe la gtugs pa'i zhus dag gnyis kyi rjes la sog tshul khrims bla ma'i phyag dpe la gtugs pa'i zhus dag nan can lan gnyis te bzhi tshar ba'i rjes su/ slob dpon tshul khrims bskyangs kyi 'grel pa dang stun cing / mdo rtsa'i 'grel chen rnams su lung dngas pa dang yang sgrigs/ cho ga rnams las brgya rtsa cig gi gzhung dang yang bstun/ tshig 'dra la 'dra min rnams kyang / don la legs par dpyad nas dag par byas/ 'di la da rung chad pa 'ga' re yod pas rgya dpe rnyed na gtug dgos so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon bstan pa snga dar la lung phran tshegs kyi gzhi 'di bsgyur ba'i dus su lo ts+tsha ba du mas dum bu mang por bgos te so sor tha dad du bsgyur bas glegs bam gcig tu sdom pa'i tshe na/ gnas gcig tu ma tshang par bsdebs shing / lo tsh+tsha ba chen po dpal 'byor gyis rdzogs par zhu chen ma grub pas/ 'khrug chad can du phran tshegs phal cher bzhugs pa las/ dus phyis gnas brtan dar ma seng ges/ la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi bzhengs pa'i tshe/ zhing mo che pa 'dul 'dzin byang chub seng ges dbus rtsang gi gtsug lang khang dang / khyad par bsam yas mchims phu na dgas chung ba dang tshul khrims yon tan gyis rnyed pa'i lung dag pa la dpe yon phul nas 'bad pas dag par bgyis pa la/ bam po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mgor sman chen po'i gtam gyi skabs su/ sman chen pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang bden nam brdzun blta'o zhes pa nas/ bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbur/ ji tsam grong khyer nas byung ba dang bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' nas 'jus zhes pa'i bar bam po gcig bsabs/ sdom ni/ nga yang sman gyis de bzhin no/ /zhes pa'i 'og tu yig tshar gcig bskangs/ bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad ne tsho spyod gsal gyi skabs rdzogs par e ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no zhes pa nas/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i stod du spyi'i sdom ni/dge slong ma'i bkur bsti bri/ zhes pa'i bar bam po dgu chad pa bsabs/ de'i 'og tu sdom tshig yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsabaduna pa'i 'jug bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gi gtam 'phror/ dge sbyong rnams kyi yon po'i spyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no/ /nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'i dbur/ de'i tshe bram ze pad ma'i snying po khyim mchog gis mthon po zhig na shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rnams dang lhan cig 'dus shing 'khod do zhes pa'i bar bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa bsabs/ de nas bam po nga gcig pa'i 'jug kun daga'o la gdams par chos kyi skyabs kyi gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan dang skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no nas/ bam po nga gsum pa'i stod du/ bar sdom ni/ tsa pa la dang tshe'i 'du byed mdzad kyi bar bam bo gcig bskangs te/ dag par bzhengs pa'i lung de la phyi mo mdzad nas/ snar thang du mkhan chen mchims nam mkha' grags kyis dag par bzhengs pa'i dpe la gtugs zhus dag bgyi'o/ /lo rgyus 'di lung phran tshegs kyi glegs bam la shin tu gces pas/ sus kyang mi 'dor bar thugs rtsis mdzad par zhu/ 1.

12 H11 brgyad stong, ka 1b1-523a1 (vol. 29) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa Ar+ya aSh+Ta sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs s+ho/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya se na dang dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de'e d+harma tA shI la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/ slad kyis dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod kyi dpal lha btsan po bkra shis lha lde btsan gyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hA Shi ta dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos 'grel pa dang mthun par bsgyur/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos yul dbus kyi 'grel pa la gtugs nas bcos shing zhus te gtan la phab/ yang slad kyis skyid smad gnye thang na mo cher/ paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gnyis kyis brgyad stong pa bshad pa'i dus su che long zhig gtan la phab/ phyis rwa sgreng gi gtsug lag khang du lo tsA ba 'brom rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis rgya gar gyi mdo gsum la gtugs nas lan gnyis gtan la phab/ slad kyis yang lo tsA ba de nyid kyis bshad pa mdzad cing phran tshegs kyang gtan la phab/ dus phyis lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma bsags nas gtan la phab/ slar yang snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa chen po/ zha lu lo tsA ba dpal rin chen chos skyong bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis/ rgya bod kyi dpe du ma dang bstun nas shin tu rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i ma phyi las slar yang zhus te gtan la phab pa'o 1.

24 H15 sna tshogs, ka 123b2-162b7 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya sap+ta sha ti ka nA ma pradz+nyA ma ra mi ta ma hA ya na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa rdzogs so// skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// 1.

15 H16 sna tshogs, ka 163a1-189a2 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa Ar+ya pany+tsa sha ti ka pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa rdzogs so// skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o//
13 H17 sna tshogs, ka 189a2-215a4 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta sany+tsa ya ga thA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sid+ha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
16 H18 sna tshogs, ka 215a4-235b7 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya badzra ts+tshe da ka nA ma pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta ma hA ya na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
17 H19 sna tshogs, ka 236a1-246a7 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta na ya sha ta pany+tsa sha ti ka 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//
25 H20 sna tshogs, ka 246a7-248b7 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
18 H21 sna tshogs, ka 248b7-252b2 (vol. 34) 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa Ar+ya b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta pany+tsa sha ti ka 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa rdzogs so//
23 H22 sna tshogs, ka 252b2-253a1 (vol. 34) bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba b+ha ga wa ti pra dz+nyA pa ra mI ta sarba ta thA ga ta mA ta e ka ak+Sha ri nA ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma rdzogs so//
19 H23 sna tshogs, ka 253a1-255a5 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba Ar+ya ko'u shi la pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
22 H24 sna tshogs, ka 255a5-257b5 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya sAl+pA k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
490 H25 sna tshogs, ka 257b5-259a6 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya pany+tsa bing+sha ti ka pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab ba'o//
529 H26 sna tshogs, ka 259a6-261a3 (vol. 34) 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po Ar+ya b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA hri da ya bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cib/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge blo dang / nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
26 H27 sna tshogs, ka 261a3-263a3 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po'i theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA sU r+ya gar+b+ha ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
27 H28 sna tshogs, ka 263a3-264b6 (vol. 34) 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya tsan+d+ra gar+b+ha pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
28 H29 sna tshogs, ka 264b6-265b4 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
29 H30 sna tshogs, ka 265b4-266b1 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA badzra pA Ni ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po rdzogs so//
30 H31 sna tshogs, ka 266b1-267a7 (vol. 34) 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po Ar+ya pra dz+nyA pa ra mi tA badzra ke tu ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so//
31 H32 sna tshogs, ka 268a1-273b1 (vol. 34) chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i mdo d+harma tsakra pra barta na sU tra chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing / gtsug lag gnyis la thugs legs par byang ba/ dpal 'byor dbang phyug dam pa dkar phyogs kyi zla ba ltar 'phel ba'i zha lu ba sku zhang grags pa rgyal mtshan du dben sha'i bka' lung gis byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan las/ lho phyogs su dpag tshad drug brgya tsam bgrod pa'i gnas/ sing g+ha gling pa bram ze'i rigs las legs par rab tu byung zhing / bsnyen par rdzogs pa sde snod gsum la thugs legs par byang ba'i paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba lta bur gyur cig
32 H33 sna tshogs, ka 273b1-388a5 (vol. 34) skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi dzA ta ka ni dA naM skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas dang / mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig
33 H34 sna tshogs, ka 388a5-403b5 (vol. 34) lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo A TA nA Ti ya sU tra lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig skabs rab mchog dang po
395b7
34 H35 sna tshogs, ka 403b5-409a6 (vol. 34) 'dus pa chen po'i mdo ma hA sa ma ya sU tra 'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig
35 H36 sna tshogs, ka 409a6-420a2 (vol. 34) byams pa'i mdo mai trI sU tra byams pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa steng du nyi ma dang/ zla ba ltar gyur cig
36 H37 sna tshogs, ka 420a2-421b2 (vol. 34) byams pa bsgom pa'i mdo mai tri b+ha ba na sU tra byams pa bsgom pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig
37 H38 sna tshogs, ka 421b2-430a5 (vol. 34) bslab pa lnga'i phan yon gyi mdo prany+tsa shIk+Sh+ya nu saM sa sU tra tshul khrims lnga'i phan yon bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig
38 H39 sna tshogs, ka 430a5-434b7 (vol. 34) ri'i kun dga' bo'i mdo gi ri A nan+da sU tra tshe dang ldan pa ri'i kun dga' bo'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
39 H40 sna tshogs, ka 434b7-438b3 (vol. 34) klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' 'dul ba'i mdo nan+do pa nan+da nA ga rA dza da ma na sU tra klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' 'dul ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig
40 H41 sna tshogs, ka 438b3-440a3 (vol. 34) 'od srung chen po'i mdo ma hA kA sh+ya pa sU tra gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig
41 H42 sna tshogs, ka 440a3-441a2 (vol. 34) nyi ma'i mdo sU r+ya sU tra nyi ma'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig
42 H43 sna tshogs, ka 441a2-441b6 (vol. 34) zla ba'i mdo tsan+d+ra sU tra zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig
43 H44 sna tshogs, ka 441b6-443a3 (vol. 34) bkra shis chen po'i mdo ma hA maM ga la sU tra bkra shis chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa'i steng du nyi ma zla ba ltar gyur cig

76 H76 dkon brtsegs, ca 387a1-411b1 (vol. 39) 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya a sho ka dat+ta byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / lo ts+tsha ba zhang ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 1.
387a2-411a7
77 H77 dkon brtsegs, ca 411b1-442a7 (vol. 39) 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya bi ma la dat+ta pa ri pri ts+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 1.

78 H78 dkon brtsegs, ca 442a7-449a4 (vol. 39) 'phags pa yon tan rin po che me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya gu Na rat+na sang ku su mi ta pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
79 H79 dkon brtsegs, ca 449a4-478a7 (vol. 39) 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya tsin t+ya bud+d+ha bi Sha ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa lha'i bu dpal bzang gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus bsum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d+ha na shI la dang / mu ne warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 1.

208 H209 mdo sde, ma 169b1-173b4 (vol. 62) 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya ma hA ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shu d+d+ha sid+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kar sid+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de wa tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa/
209 H210 mdo sde, ma 173b4-180a3 (vol. 62) 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya sid+ha nA di ka na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de sba rje ye shes snying pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa/
210 H211 mdo sde, ma 180a3-192b1 (vol. 62) 'phags pa sA lu'i ljang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya shA li stam+b+ha lnA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sA lu ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
211 H212 mdo sde, ma 192b1-195a2 (vol. 62) rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA dA di tsa bi b+hang+ga nirde sha nA ma sU tra rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dang po dang /rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
212 H213 mdo sde, ma 195a2-196a6 (vol. 62) 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut pA ra da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
213 H214 mdo sde, ma 196a7-315b5 (vol. 62) 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya aM gu li mA lI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de d+harma tA shI la dang / rgya'i lo tsA ba ban+de tod A tsa la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 1.

218 H219 mdo sde, ma 438a7-461a1 (vol. 62) 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya karma A pa ra Na bi shud d+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde lasogasa pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
219 H220 mdo sde, ma 461a1-477a6 (vol. 62) 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya karma A wa ra na pra ti pra sra bi ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shI la la sogs pa dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos shing gtan la phab pa
220 H221 mdo sde, tsa 1b1-130b4 (vol. 63) sangs rgyas kyi sde snod tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bud+d+ha pi Ta ka duH shI la ni gra hI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra mdo sde rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par 'thag pa theg pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi sde snod ces bya ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI pra b+ha dang / lo tsA ba dge slong dpal gyi lhun pos/ pho brang lhan dkar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 1.

254b1 sprin chen po'i tshogs nam mkha' las 'byung ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa
255a2 glog gi 'od kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa
255b3 sprin chen po'i glog 'gyur ba dang ldan zhing mun pa 'joms pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa
256a5 sprin chen po'i glog gi sgyu 'phrul gyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa
256b5 cho 'phrul chen po'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa
257a5 hos kyi thog tog gi 'bel ba'i gtam gyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa
257b5 ye shes rdo rje'i rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa
258a5 longs spyod mi zad pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po'i chos kyi sgo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa
258b6 yang dag pa'i lam gyi rnam pa mngon par mtshon pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi sgo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa
259a6 phra zhing zab pa'i gleng gzhi'i rnam pa la 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa
259b7 seng+ge rnam par rtse ba la dmigs pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa
260b2 mtshams sbyar ba tshogs pa'i rnam pa 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug par bya ba la 'jug pa'i mdo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa
261a4 mngon par rtse ba rin po che'i mdzod la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gsum pa
261b6 nam mkha' lding gi rtsal chen po'i stobs la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bzhi pa
262b1 sgra chen po'i dus rnam par bsgrags pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa
263a2 mi 'jigs pa chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu drug pa
263b3 gnas kyi rnam pa dang bcas pa yangs pa'i tshod kyi sgo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bdun pa
264a3 lhag pa'i bsam pa'i cho ga la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu brgyad pa
264b4 dmag chen po dpa' ba'i rgyal po stobs bkod pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu dgu pa
265a5 bzang po'i rnam pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa
265b6 rtse ba dang bcas pa yang dag par sbas pa ston pa'i dpung bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gcig pa
266b2 ye shes rtsom pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'i rnam pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gnyis pa
267a2 ye shes kyi nor bsgrims ste sgrub pa'i mdzod kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu gsum pa
267b4 yang dag pa'i mchod sbyin la phan pa'i cho ga bkod pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu bzhi pa
268a4 sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yang dag pa'i sa bon rab tu skyed pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu lnga pa
268b5 de kho na'i snying po'i tshul gyis mngon par rtse ba la dga' ba'i rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu drug pa
269a7 dam pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phung po'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu bdun pa

233 H234 mdo sde, tsha 337b7-386a3 (vol. 64) 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha sU trA ta da sha di ga bod+hi sat+wa sa mu dra san+ni pa ti ma ho t+wa ba bi krI Di tanA ma pa ri barta mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/
234 H235 mdo sde, tsha 386a3-392b5 (vol. 64) 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA yu maN+Da la pa ri barta sarba nA ga hr-i da ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/
235 H236 mdo sde, tsha 392b5-412a7 (vol. 64) 'phags pa sprin chen po Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
236 H237 mdo sde, tsha 412a7-448b3 (vol. 64) bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug gtor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo le'u stong phrag bcu pa las le'u bcu pa b+ha ga wA na uSh+Ni Sha ma hA 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor chen po'i le'u stong phrag bcu pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa don mngon par 'thob par spyod pa'i rgyu le'u bcu pa rdzogs so// 1.
412b1-432a2 2.

244 H245 mdo sde, wa 23a6-41b7 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
245 H246 mdo sde, wa 41b7-50a3 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya d+harma Na ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po prad z+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
246 H247 mdo sde, wa 50a3-64b6 (vol. 66) 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya ba ra mAr+tha d+harma bi dza ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis gtan la phab pa/
247 H248 mdo sde, wa 64b6-70a6 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya d+harma ar+tha bi b+ha ga nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
248 H249 mdo sde, wa 70a6-90a3 (vol. 66) byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar ba chos bzhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bo d+hi sat+wa pra ti mok+Sha tsa tuSh+ka ni ra hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa chos bzhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros dang / dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
249 H250 mdo sde, wa 90a3-91a4 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya tsa tur+d+harma ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
250 H251 mdo sde, wa 91a4-92a1 (vol. 66) chos bzhi pa'i mdo tsa tur+d+harma ka sU tra chos bzhi pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
251 H252 mdo sde, wa 92a1-93a1 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya tsa tur+d+harma ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
252 H253 mdo sde, wa 93a2-106b7 (vol. 66) 'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo Ar+ya tsa tush+ka ni ra hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
253 H254 mdo sde, wa 107a1-108b5 (vol. 66) chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo tri d+harma ka nA ma sU tra chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he de ba tsan+d+ras bsgyur/ lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/
254 H255 mdo sde, wa 108b5-109b1 (vol. 66) 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po Ar+ya d+harma ke tu d+h+wa dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

277 H279 mdo sde, za 123a1-127a7 (vol. 68) 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su re n+d+ra b+ho d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de te ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
278 H280 mdo sde, za 127a7-130b1 (vol. 68) 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa bkra shis brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su re n+d+ra b+ho d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de te ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
279 H281 mdo sde, za 130b1-131a5 (vol. 68) 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa [dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo] - 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
280 H282 mdo sde, za 131a5-131b3 (vol. 68) chos rjes su dran pa [dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo] - chos rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
281 H283 mdo sde, za 131b3-131b6 (vol. 68) dge 'dun rjes su dran pa [dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i mdo] - dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//
282 H284 mdo sde, za 131b6-132a7 (vol. 68) bslab pa gsum gyi mdo - bslab pa gsum gyi mdo rdzogs so//
283 H285 mdo sde, za 132b1-133b5 (vol. 68) 'phags pa sku gsum zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa sku gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
284 H286 mdo sde, za 133b5-164a6 (vol. 68) 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
285 H287 mdo sde, za 164a6-168a6 (vol. 68) 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba - 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so//
286 H288 mdo sde, za 168a6-171a4 (vol. 68) 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba - 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa/
287 H289 mdo sde, za 171a4-ra 355b7 (vol. 68-71) 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa - stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug pa 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung/ /de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de yi 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/ /nye bar mkho ba thams cad legs par skrun pa la sogs pas phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos po mtha' dag dang ldan pa/ sa gzhi'i yon tan dang rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ spyang zhing sgrin la skye bo thams cad blo dang ldan pas 'dzam bu'i gling yul rnams kyi mig tu dgongs nas/ ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni klung chen po 'bab pa chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram gyis bsdus pa ches yangs par gyur pa/ rgya gar gyi yul lo de'i yang dbus su gtogs pa las shar gyi cha yul chen po shar phyogs pa len dra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po ston pa'i bstan pa'i mig dang / rtsa ba dang / gzhir gyur pa dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i sras phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyis gzhan las mtho bas mnga' cher sgyur ba'i sa'i bdag po ne be'i pA la zhes bya ba'i mtho ris dang / thar pa'i them skas mkhas shing btsun la dul ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas su mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang dza gad dA la na mkhas pa'i skye dgu paN+Di ta rnams mang du byung shing / mang gis kyang chen po las chen por gyur pa lnga brgya pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten las sgrogs pa/ sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams dang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsngags pas paN+Di ta rnams kyis bsngags par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pas nga rgyal ba'i rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lus kyi mgo ltar gnyan bar khur ba mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can paN+Di ta dang / 'jig rten pa rnams kyis gtsug lag gi nor bu ltar 'dzin pa/ tshe 'di ring du spangs pa'i skye bo thar pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams kyis skyon legs par mthong bas lam 'dren pa'i mig dang 'dra bar 'dren par lta ba/ yul gyi mi thams cad kyis bu gcig pa ltar snying du sdug cing mthun par gyur pas/ dmu rgod lta bur log par sgrub pa rnams ches mthun par 'dzin pas yid 'phrog par mdzad pa/'gro ba nyams thag pa rnams gzigs nas brtse ba'i zug rngus sems gdungs kyang thugs rje'i phyag brkyang bas skal pa dang mthun par rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ spyir lung bstan pa'i mdo sde stag rna'i rgyu skar las yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang / rtsom pa po chen po nyid dang / lus brjes nas mtho ris su skye ba bzhes par lung bstan pa/'phags pa byams pa dang mjal bar bzhed pa'i sred pa dang / chos kyi sred pa dang / chos kyi srid pa bla lhag pa mnga' ba/ chags sdang la sogs pa thams cad ni shas chung bar gyur pa'i skyes bu de'i bsngags pa spro bar ni sus nus/ mdor bsdu na/ 'jig rten mi chos kyi mkhyen pa che zhing bzang ba/ gser gyi sa gzhi dang 'dra ba la/ dam pa'i lha chos phun sum tshogs pa mkhas pa dang / btsun pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / mnyen pa dang / des pa dang/ bden par smra ba/ g.yo med pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can/ sgrub pa la snying por mdzad pa'i dpag bsams kyi ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa g.yu'i manDal dang mtshungs par 'khrungs pa las tshe 'di dang / gzhan dang / gnas skabs dang / mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu yongs su rgyas shing rnam par smin pas bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i pha rol tu byon pas cung zad kyang don med pa ma yin pa/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i dpal gyis mdzes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta A ka ra 'agup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / mkhas pa chen po skyes bu dam pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i yang mchog tu gyur pa paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra 'gu p+ta dang / thos pa 'dzin pas 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar grags pa spobs pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi mchog paN+Di ta chen po shAkya rak+Shi ta dang / paN+Di ta chen po bI r+ya A ka ra shan+ti la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe lnga dang / gzhan yang yul dbus ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten mang du bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas pa'i skye bo dkon mchog gsum la dad pas yul gang ba'i ma ga d+ha'i yul smad na/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de ba pA las mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bstan pa'i mig tu gyur pa bi kra ma shI la na yang mkhas pa'i skye bo mang du zin kyang shAkya rak+Shi ta de nyid dang / sgra dang / snyan dngags dang/ legs par dpyad pa'i skad kyi lugs la mkhas pa'i paN+Di ta chen po su b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang / mngon pa la mkhas pa paNa Ti ta tsan tra la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe gnyis la legs par mnyan cing gus pas thad du bsten nas don dang tshig ma lus par rtogs pa'i bshad pa zhus nas / shin tu dka' ba'i gnas rnams la ni phyi zhing legs par dpyad pas don dgrol ba'i thabs zhus te/ 'gyur gyi yan lag rgya gar gyi saM skri ta dang / 'phral skad gnyis/ bod kyi chos skad dang 'phral skad gnyis te/ bzhi la dbang 'byor ba'i shes rab kyi snang ba thob mod kyis kyang/ spyir mdo sde la don gyi gnas mang bas tshig don phal cher brling zhing lhag par yang mdo 'di don du ma tshig zur rnams kyis ngag gcig tu 'brel bar ston pa ni tshig mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis don gsal bar mdzad pa snyan dngags kyi dbang phyug 'gran gyi do zla med pa rnams kyi mdzad pa'i rim pa yin pa'i phyir na/ sbyangs pa zhan pa rnams la sla ba ma yin la/ khyad par du yang gzhung nyung bas don du ma ston pa'i mdo dum bu rnams ni spyi sor bsgyur bar mngon yang/ blo'i nor can rnams kyis ni de nyid la don du ma nges nus la/ bye brag tu gsal btab na ni don cig ston par 'khrul ba'i phyir dang / tshig ji tsam pas brjod pa de tsam du bsgyur bar rigs pa'i yang phyir te/ mdor na rgya bod kyi don thun mong pa brda tha dad pa'i byed pa ma nyams par byas nas / sngon gyi bsgyur ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bkas bcad la sogs pa'i lugs dang yang mi 'gal bar byang phyogs pa tshab kyi rgyud du skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis dam pa'i chos la gus pas rgya gar gyi rgyal po phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbang phyug gzhan pas ches mtho ba dang ldan pa ra ma pA la'i ring la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i shas shig 'gyur ba'i 'phro yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bsgyur ba'o// // slad kyis zhu thug la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhang bu gcig pa zhes bya ba rab tu grags shing skye dgu rnams sgrogs pa yang 'jig rten pa ni rang la phan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis brjod pa de dag rnams kyi gshis yin pa'i phyir te/ skyes bu des ni sems can la bu gcig pa la bzhin du dgongs pas sras gcig pa'o/ /des ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mtshon no/ /chos la gnas pa rnams la shes rab 'od ces grags pa yang theg pa'i rim pa dang mthun par mkhyen cing bden pa gnyis la sogs pa'i sgor bsdu bas mos pa dang / nges pa dang / mngon du rtogs shing shes nas rang dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od mdzad pa'i phyir te/ des ni shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /dam pa'i skye bo des grogs mdzad nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan nyid kyis dag par byas so/ /de ltar na dang po'i gzhi 'gyur dang / zhu chen dang / tshig don gyi 'brel dpyad pa dang / zhu chung dang yang 'brel dpyad pa dang lngar zhus shing gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o/ /dam chos mdo sde rin chen theg pa kun gyi gzhi dang rtsa ba bcud du gyur pa'i theg chen dran gzhag 'di/ /legs bsgyur dngos dang de yi grogs byed thams cad dang ni nam mkha' mthas gtugs 'gro kun dge ba dri med kyis/ /srid na bde sbyin skyabs gnas rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'bras ldan sa yi gnas skabs ljon shing lo 'dab phun tshogs shog /dang por tshe 'di rjes nas sangs rgyas zhing dag skye zhing 'khor tshe gzhan la phan pa 'ba' zhig byed par shog /bam po'i grangs su ni ma bcad do//gzhung tshad ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rgya dpe rang la bzhugs so//
1126 H290 mdo sde, ra 356a1-445a1 (vol. 71) las gdags pa - las gdags pa bshad pa tshigs bcu gcig pa ste/ las gdags pa bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so//
288 H291 mdo sde, ra 445a1-467b4 (vol. 71) mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba - mdo chen po sgyu ma'i dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
289 H292 mdo sde, ra 467b4-476b2 (vol. 71) mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba - mdo chen po gzugs can snying pos bsu ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
290 H293 mdo sde, ra 476b2-482a4 (vol. 71) mdo chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba - mdo chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
291 H294 mdo sde, ra 482a4-495a7 (vol. 71) mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po zhes bya ba - mdo chen po stong pa nyid chen po rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
292 H295 mdo sde, ra 495a7-501a2 (vol. 71) mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba - mdo chen po rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
293 H296 mdo sde, ra 501a2-503b3 (vol. 71) mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba - mdo chen po rgyal mtshan dam pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
294 H297 mdo sde, ra 503b3-517b2 (vol. 71) mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba - mdo chen po lnga gsum pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
295 H298 mdo sde, ra 517b2-549b1 (vol. 71) 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo - 'phags pa rdo 'phangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ pa tsha ba kyis zhu chen bgyis/
296 H299 mdo sde, ra 549b1-551b6 (vol. 71) gzhon nu dpe'i mdo - gzhon nu dpe'i mdo rdzogs so//
297 H300 mdo sde, ra 551b6-559a1 (vol. 71) khams mang po'i mdo - khams mang po ba zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
298 H301 mdo sde, ra 559a1-562b3 (vol. 71) gaN Ti'i mdo - gaN+DI mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha r+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims yo tan gyis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan phab pa/
299 H302 mdo sde, ra 562b3-564a2 (vol. 71) gaN Ti'i dus kyi mdo - 'phags pa gaN+DI'i dus kyi mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pang ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba/
300 H303 mdo sde, ra 564a2-565a6 (vol. 71) 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo - 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
301 H304 mdo sde, la 1b1-193b3 (vol. 72) mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo - mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
302 H305 mdo sde, la 193b3-196a2 (vol. 72) dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba - dge slong la rab tu gces pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
303 H306 mdo sde, la 196a2-197a6 (vol. 72) tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo - tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
304 H307 mdo sde, la 197a6-201b1 (vol. 72) ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo - ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya dz+nyA na shrI gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/
305 H308 mdo sde, la 201b1-202b3 (vol. 72) mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo - mchog tu gdags pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
306 H309 mdo sde, la 202b3-214a2 (vol. 72) rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba - rnam par grol ba'i lam las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ kun nas btus pa gsum pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/
307 H310 mdo sde, la 214a3-223b7 (vol. 72) tshe'i mtha'i mdo - tshe'i mtha'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+d+ha sing+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dge ba'i dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang /zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/
308 H311 mdo sde, la 223b7-237b4 (vol. 72) tshe 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus pa'i mdo - 'chi 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
309 H312 mdo sde, la 237b4-238b4 (vol. 72) mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo - mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus nas skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bsnan nas gtan la phab pa/
310 H313 mdo sde, la 238b4-241a2 (vol. 72) mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo - mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo rdzogs so//
890 H314 mdo sde, la 241a3-241b4 (vol. 72) 'du shes bcu bstan pa -
311 H315 mdo sde, la 241b4-242a5 (vol. 72) 'phags pa 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa'i mdo - 'du shes bcu gcig bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal chems rdzogs so//
312 H316 mdo sde, la 242a6-248a7 (vol. 72) 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po - 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs so//
313 H317 mdo sde, la 248a7-252a4 (vol. 72) 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo - 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
314 H318 mdo sde, la 252a4-260b2 (vol. 72) mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo - mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /byang phyogs rgyud kyi phreng ba'i mdo khri pa'i nang nas yul tha len dra'i byang phyogs kyi mtshams kyi ri/ ung shi ri bsngags pa'o//
315 H319 mdo sde, la 260b3-261a4 (vol. 72) pha ma'i mdo - pha ma'i mdo rdzogs so//
316 H320 mdo sde, la 261a4-262b6 (vol. 72) 'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo - 'phags pa bden pa bzhi'i mdo rdzogs so//
317 H321 mdo sde, la 262b6-289a1 (vol. 72) don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs - don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA pa rma dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes ba sbyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
318 H322 mdo sde, la 289a1-297a7 (vol. 72) 'phags pa don rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs -
319 H323 mdo sde, la 297a7-302a4 (vol. 72) 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs - 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/
320 H324 mdo sde, la 302a4-305a1 (vol. 72) 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs - 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/
321 H325 mdo sde, la 305a1-308b6 (vol. 72) mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa - mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
322 H326 mdo sde, la 308b6-313b3 (vol. 72) gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa - gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
323 H327 mdo sde, la 313b3-313b6 (vol. 72) tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa - tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so//
324 H328 mdo sde, la 313b6-314a5 (vol. 72) tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ba - tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so//
325 H329 mdo sde, la 314a6-320b7 (vol. 72) klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa - klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
326 H330 mdo sde, la 320b7-387b2 (vol. 72) ched du brjod pa'i tshoms - ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa chos skyob kyis bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA pra b+ha ka ra dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa/
327 H331 mdo sde, la 387b2-389a6 (vol. 72) 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo - 'phags pa skyes bu dam pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/ ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus chen bgyis/
328 H332 mdo sde, la 389a6-393b1 (vol. 72) dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo - dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rtsangs de ben+d+ra rak+Shi tas zhus chen bgyis pa/
329 H333 mdo sde, la 393b1-395b4 (vol. 72) lha'i mdo - lha'i mdo rdzogs so//
330 H334 mdo sde, la 395b5-396b6 (vol. 72) lha'i mdo nyung ngu - lha'i mdo nyung ngu rdzogs so/ /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
331 H335 mdo sde, la 396b6-397b4 (vol. 72) zla ba'i mdo - zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /
332 H336 mdo sde, la 397b4-403a2 (vol. 72) khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo - khang bu brtsegs kyi mdo rdzogs so//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba rat+na rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
333 H337 mdo sde, la 403a2-409b1 (vol. 72) 'phags pa gnas 'jog gi mdo zhes bya ba - 'phags pa gnas 'jog ces bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
334 H338 mdo sde, la 409b1-413b4 (vol. 72) 'phags pa dga' ba can gyi mdo - 'phags pa dga' ba can gyi mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya si ng+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de byin gyi snying pos bsgyur te/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa//
335 H339 mdo sde, la 413b4-418b3 (vol. 72) 'phags pa 'khar gsil gyi mdo - 'phags pa 'khar gsil zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
336 H340 mdo sde, la 418b3-420a2 (vol. 72) 'khar gsil 'chang pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga - 'khar gsil 'chang ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so//
337 H341 mdo sde, la 420a2-423a1 (vol. 72) chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo - chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo rdzogs so/ /
892 H342 mdo sde, la 423a1-425b6 (vol. 72) las kyi rnam smin gyi bras bu bstan pa'i mdo - las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i mdo rdzogs so//sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya'i lo tsA ba thang sam tsa zhes byas rgya gar dngos las rgya nag tu legs par bsgyur cing phyis gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba rgya nag chen po'i lha btsun chos kyi rin chen gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
338 H343 mdo sde, la 425b6-455a7 (vol. 72) las rnam par 'byed pa - las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /dA na shI la dang / mu ni barma dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o/
893 H344 mdo sde, la 455a7-490b5 (vol. 72) rnam 'byed chung ba - las kyi rnam par 'gyur ba rdzogs so//
339 H345 mdo sde, la 490b5-510a2 (vol. 72) las kyi rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi gzhung -
340 H346 mdo sde, sha 1b1-sa 207b4 (vol. 73-74) las brgya tham pa - las brgya tham pa rdzogs so//
341 H347 mdo sde, sa 207b4-476b2 (vol. 74) mdzangs blun zhes bya ba'i mdo - mdzangs blun zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya nag las 'gyur bar snang ngo//
342 H348 mdo sde, sa 476b2-478b7 (vol. 74) kun tu rgyu pa sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo - kun tu rgyu sen ring gis zhus pa'i mdo rdzogs so// bka' dang por gtogs so//
894 H349 mdo sde, sa 478b7-489b7 (vol. 74) byams pa'i mdo - 'phags pa byams pa'i mdo rdzogs so// thub dbang mchog dang rgyal ba byams pa yi//bstan pa gsal byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di//yon tan dang ldan sing ga gling yul gyi//stong phrag mang po'i dge 'dun kun gyi gtso//mar me mdzad slob rdo rje gdan bzhugs pa//paN chen A nan da shrI yon tan can//dge slong chos kyi spyan can skad gnyis mkhas//bstan la phan 'dod bzang po de nyid dang / /de'i legs gtugs dge slong lung rigs 'dzin/ /skad gnyis smra ba mchog gi rjes 'jug pa//kun dga' rgyal mtshan thub bstan dpal bzang pos/ /ston pa 'das nas lo stong brgyad brgya dang/ /lnga bcu lhag pa'i zla ba bcu 'das dus/ /chos kyi rgyal po ha shang mnga' gsol tshe/ /me lug dgun zla ra ba'i yar ngo la/ dpal ldan bla ma kun dga' seng ge yi/ sku drin la brten dpal ldan sa skyar ni/ /sgra don ji bzhin legs par bsgyur ba yin/ /'phags nor rgyan ldan skyes bu dam pa rnams/ /dam chos rin chen 'di la gtsug rgyan mdzod/ /nyon mongs nad can phrag dog rab rib can/ /chos sman 'di sten nad med mig gsal 'gyur/ dge ba 'di gzhan ma lus legs bsdoms te/ /bla ma thub dbang byams pa mgon la sogs//sangs rgyas kun mnyes rnam dag rgya chen zhing/ /rnam dag rab bskyungs bstan pa mchog bsgrubs nas/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed kyi sprul pa yis/ /sems can thams cad bstan la dang byas shing/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rab tu rgyas byas te//sangs rgyas sku gsum ye shes myur thob shog /shes bya mtha' yas rab tu zab phyir dang //shes byed tshad can rab tu rtogs sla'i phyir/ /'khrul par gyur na rab tu sems dge ba'i phyir//skye bo mkhas rnams rab tu bzod mdzad rigs //rgyan dpe dang legs par btugs so// phyogs dus thams cad du bkra shis dang bde legs kyis khyab par gyur cig/
895 H350 mdo sde, sa 489b7-496a5 (vol. 74) byams pa lung bstan pa -
343 H351 mdo sde, ha 1b1-446a1 (vol. 75) gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa - rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs te/ gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/
344 H352 mdo sde, ha 446a1-450a1 (vol. 75) 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo - 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra sing ha dang / sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
345 H353 mdo sde, ha 450a1-452b7 (vol. 75) 'phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo - phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ye shes sdes ba sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
346 H354 mdo sde, ha 452b7-464a5 (vol. 75) ma ga dha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa - ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur te/ sgra sgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa/
347 H355 mdo sde, a 1b1-34b1 (vol. 76) bsod nams kyi stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa - bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de de ba tsan+dras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
348 H356 mdo sde, a 34b1-49a6 (vol. 76) zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa - rgyal po zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//
349 H357 mdo sde, a 49a7-79a4 (vol. 76) dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa - rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa/
350 H358 mdo sde, a 79a4-87b7 (vol. 76) gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba - gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
351 H359 mdo sde, a 87b7-111a4 (vol. 76) 'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo - 'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo zhes bya ba'i bam po gcig rdzogs so/ /sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i brda rnying par 'dug
352 H360 mdo sde, a 111a5-135b6 (vol. 76) tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo - tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzogs so//
353 H361 mdo sde, a 135b6-313b7 (vol. 76) thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo - thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya nag las bod du 'gyur ba la 'gyur gsar bcad ma byas pa'o//
354 H362 mdo sde, a 314a1-330b7 (vol. 76) 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang /'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ /zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de chos grub kyis rgya gar dang rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
355 H363 mdo sde, a 331a1-342a6 (vol. 76) dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa'i mdo - dge sdig rnam par dbye ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
356 H364 mdo sde, a 342a6-349a7 (vol. 76) 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i tshul lung bstan pa - sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bstan pa gnas pa dang / 'jig pa'i tshul lung bstan pa'i skabs rdzogs so//
357 H365 mdo sde, a 349a7-367b7 (vol. 76) 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa ri glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
358 H366 mdo sde, a 367b7-435b2 (vol. 76) stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa - 'phags pa stag rna'i mdo rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur/
359 H367 mdo sde, a 435b2-442a7 (vol. 76) mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo - mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
119 H368 myang 'das, ka 1b1-kha 529a7 (vol. 77-78) 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo - 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ /mdo mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya nag nas bsgyur ba 'di/ rgya nag gi mkhan po wang pham zhwun dang / d+harma'i gzhi 'dzin dge ba'i blo gros dang / lo ts+tsha ba rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
360 H369 rgyud, ka 1b1-19a3 (vol. 79) 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa - rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor ba'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur kyi lo ts+tsha ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gis dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o/ /sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod/ /'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du//rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur//
